Package imagingbook.common.mser.components

Class PixelMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.mser.components.PixelMap
  • public class PixelMap
extends Object
    Basically a 2D array of pixels. This class holds all necessary information about the image geometry. It keeps track of which pixels have been visited and knows how to access neighboring pixels (currently 4-neighborhood only). TODO: Bring in line with binary region neighborhoods (type).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PixelMap.Pixel
      A pixel value which knows its coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PixelMap.Pixel getPixel​(int u, int v)  
      PixelMap.Pixel[] getPixelVector()
      Returns a new 1D array (i.e., a "flattened" vector) of PixelMap.Pixel elements, e.g., for sorting pixels by value.
      void reset()
      Sets all pixels to unvisited and resets next-neighbor search directions.
